July 11, 1903 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (C Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (C Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-ass-2848
None
Test Piece Contest
Sweet Songs of Old
New Pavilion, Mountain Ash, Glamorgan Prizes - 1st £7, 2nd £4, 3rd £2, 4th £1. Best cornet - Merthyr Vale. Best trombone - Troedyrhiw. 13th annual contest. 11 bands competed.
June 15, 2013, 6:35 p.m. May 11, 2020, 9:22 a.m.
1 Merthyr Vale Town G. H. Thomas
2 Troedyrhiw Band Thomas Hanney
3 Cwmparc Samuel Radcliffe
4 Caerphilly Carl Taylor
Unknown Result Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Walter Exley
Unknown Result Blaenavon Templars Joseph Broom
Unknown Result Ogmore Valley Silver Band William Smith

Unknown Result Mountain Ash Hibernian William Layman
